SEARCH
Package controller

Class ContentPaneController

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
controller.ContentPaneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, ItemListener, MouseListener, Runnable, EventListener
public class ContentPaneController extends Controller implements Runnable

This class is used to control the content pane (Panel) contained in the main JFrame, it controls all the actions and events from the user

  • Constructor Details

    • ContentPaneController

      public ContentPaneController(AlgorithmExecuter ALGORITHM_EXECUTER, Timer TIMER, Buffer BUFFER, Semaphore execute, Semaphore wait, Semaphore read, Semaphore write, Panel panel)

      This method creates a new instance of the ContentPaneController

      Parameters:
      ALGORITHM_EXECUTER - The AlgorithmExecuter instance that executes all the different components
      TIMER - The Timer instance that will coordinate the execution and handles the delay between all the exections
      BUFFER - The Buffer instance that handles all the outputs from the execution process
      execute - The Semaphore that handles the correct execution of the algorithm
      wait - The Semaphore that synchronizes the execution of the algorithm with the Timer
      panel - The Panel handled by this controller

    • updateTable

      public void updateTable()

      This method updates the table containing all the variables informations in the associated Panel

      It creates a new JTable and updates the debug panel

    • deleteVariablesFromMemoryStorage

      public void deleteVariablesFromMemoryStorage()

      This method calls the MemoryStorage.destroyVariables() from the memory

      See Also:
      • MemoryStorage

    • showErrorDialog

      public void showErrorDialog(String message)

      This method shows an error dialog with JOptionPane in the associated panel

      Creates a JOptionPane containing an error message provided as a parameter and shows it in the panel

      Parameters:
      message - The message that has to be shown
